change_log.summary: Major upgrade: Added global memory scope and changed tool signatures
details: BREAKING: Changed search_documents tool to require index_id parameter
Added global memory scope for cross-user knowledge sharing
Migrated to append-only retention policy for audit compliance
Added new summarize_documents tool with enhanced capabilities

name: research_assistant_agent
description: A research assistant that helps users find, analyze, and summarize documents from multiple knowledge bases.

tools.name: search_documents
tools.description: Search for documents across all available indices.

parameters.name: index_id
parameters.description: Specific index ID to search (required in v2.0.0).

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return.

tools.name: summarize_documents
tools.description: Generate a comprehensive summary of multiple documents.

parameters.name: document_ids
parameters.description: List of document IDs to summarize.
